reviewText: I am a huge fan of Kim Lyons and this book explains everything to the T, from nutrition to the correct way of working out and in between. However, it is a bit overwhelming with all of its contents:(

First you warm up then you walk. Since I'm not allowed to be on my feet or walk until the wounds on my feet heal, I walk while sitting down. It's not exactly walking but it works or me. That's my story and I'm sticking to it!
I got some other Kim Lyons videos and she really explains each exercise with so much information!  She also uses exercises that really work and are easy!
